name: Black Label Trading Co. - Last Rites - Viaticum Toro
brand: Black Label Trading Co., Last Rites
additionalNotes: A dark, Ecuadorian Maduro wrapper encases a mix of Nicaraguan and Honduran fillers with Honduran binder. The resulting flavor profile is filled with notes of earth, wood, nut, and a natural sweetness. The solid construction ensures an even burn and effortless draw throughout the duration of the cigar. As the first cigar James Brown blended on his own and to the exact specifications of everything he wanted in a cigar, Black Label Trading Last Rites offers a medium to full-bodied
